response.overview: On November 11th, 1998, Christian missionary Herb Gregg, while walking home in the Caucasus area of Russia, was wrestled into the backseat of a car where his abductors pulled a sock over his face. For the next seven months, Herb was held hostage. Herb triumphs with the help of his courageous wife, a Russian hostage, and the enduring care of the Lord.
response.title: 231 Days
